channel.title: Canada on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Canada on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Blair Underwood Is a Tough Hockey Dad in Remake of ’80s Brat Pack Favorite ‘Youngblood’
item.description: Ahead of its premiere at Toronto, the actor talks about the movie’s approach to race and the surprising cultural impact of ‘Longlegs.’

item.title: Blair Underwood Is a Tough Hockey Dad in Remake of ’80s Brat Pack Favorite ‘Youngblood’
item.description: Ahead of its premiere at Toronto, the actor talks about the movie’s approach to race and the surprising cultural impact of ‘Longlegs.’

item.title: From Folklore to Film Sets: Inside Newfoundland’s Production Boom
item.description: From sea creature thrillers to Shakespearean fog and fairy tale cliffs, Newfoundland and Labrador is becoming Hollywood’s next great north-of-the-border backlot.

item.title: From Folklore to Film Sets: Inside Newfoundland’s Production Boom
item.description: From sea creature thrillers to Shakespearean fog and fairy tale cliffs, Newfoundland and Labrador is becoming Hollywood’s next great north-of-the-border backlot.

item.title: Oscars: Canada Selects ‘The Things You Kill’ for Best International Feature Category
item.description: Iranian-Canadian director Alireza Khatami’s Turkish drama about a college professor whose private life gradually unravels after the death of his mother premiered at Sundance.

item.title: Oscars: Canada Selects ‘The Things You Kill’ for Best International Feature Category
item.description: Iranian-Canadian director Alireza Khatami’s Turkish drama about a college professor whose private life gradually unravels after the death of his mother premiered at Sundance.

item.title: Scientists Have Identified the Origin of an Extraordinarily Powerful Outer Space Radio Wave
item.description: In March 2025 the Earth was hit by a fast radio burst as energetic as the sun, but lasting only milliseconds.

item.title: Scientists Have Identified the Origin of an Extraordinarily Powerful Outer Space Radio Wave
item.description: In March 2025 the Earth was hit by a fast radio burst as energetic as the sun, but lasting only milliseconds.

item.title: Bif Naked, Pamela Carolina Martinez Star in ‘Lupe Q and the Galactic Earworms’ Sci-Fi Comedy (Exclusive)
item.description: Javier Badillo’s feature about a punk band leader discovering only her piercing scream can stop an alien invasion will be shopped to foreign buyers at the Toronto Film Festival.

item.title: Meet the Woman Empowering Young Female Music Artists in Canada
item.description: “Let’s go big or go home,” Honey Jam founder Ebonnie Rowe says ahead of a 30th anniversary concert on Wednesday at Massey Hall in Toronto.
